Package xyz.brandon.blackjack.client.network

Class Client

java.lang.Object
xyz.brandon.blackjack.client.network.Client
public class Client extends Object
Class for representing a player's client connection to a game server.
See Also:
GameServer

      public Client​(InetAddress address, int port)

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect() throws IOException
      Attempts a connection with server. Creates output and input stream if successful.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if connection fails

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Closes connection with server

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Returns whether client is currently connected to a server
      Returns:
      true if connected

    • sendString

      public boolean sendString​(String identifier, String args, boolean awaitResponse)
      Sends message to server. Follows ArgsParser format
      Parameters:
      identifier - message identifier
      args - message arguments
      awaitResponse - whether a response is needed
      Returns:
      transmission success value
      See Also:
      ArgsParser

    • listenForIdentifier

      public ArgsParser listenForIdentifier​(String identifier)
      Tells the client to listen for a specific argument identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - identifier to listen to
      Returns:
      ArgsParser representation of message with identifier from server
      See Also:
      ArgsParser

    • listenFor

      public boolean listenFor​(String identifier, String args)
      Listen for an identifier WITH specified existing args in message. Follow format of ArgsParser
      Parameters:
      identifier - argument identifier
      args - message required arguments
      Returns:
      See Also:
      ArgsParser

      Returns string representation of client showing server address:port if a active connection is present.
